name: Linked The Team [LTT]
description:
How To Play :

Two players are tied together with a rope while being attacked by hordes of zombies. You must communicate well to navigate the map eliminating the rotten flesh chasing you.  The more rounds you survive the harder it gets,  which is ideal for some relationship-ending moments.

Info :

This is an LTT-themed Top-Down Zombie Survival Shooter made in 48hrs during Ryan Laley's Spring Jam. Well,  from the quirky theme of the game to my chair breaking during the creation there is a lot to unpack so why don't you go and see yourself by downloading it, id really appreciate it!

It's a Co-Op game but I had as much fun making it and playing it by myself as I would have with friends.  So if you're like me and also don't have friends you can still have fun even tho I consider you my friend for downloading.

Controls :

WASD or Left Stick From Player 1 Movement

Arrow Keys or Right Stick For Player 2 Movement

Spacebar or Right Trigger To Fire Weapon

If you gave my game a chance I would love to hear your feedback.

Thank You, E-VOL-V!
